title-group.article-title: L¬π ERROR ESTIMATES FOR DIFFERENCE APPROXIMATIONS OF DEGENERATE CONVECTION-DIFFUSION EQUATIONS

abstract.p: We analyze monotone finite difference schemes for strongly degenerate convection-diffusion equations in one spatial dimension. These nonlinear equations are well-posed within a class of (discontinuous) entropy solutions. We prove that the L¬π error between the approximate and exact solutions is ùí™(‚ñ≥x1/3), where ‚ñ≥x is the spatial grid parameter. This result should be compared with the classical ùí™(‚ñ≥x1/2) error estimate for conservation laws (Kuznecov, 1976), and a recent estimate of ùí™(‚ñ≥x1/11) for degenerate convection-diffusion equations (Karlsen, Koley, Risebro 2012).
